group_1.textLeft: Yes! There, that's Question 10 finished!
Huh... There were so many people at the@start.
But we're pretty much the only ones around.

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Do you think we might be lagging behind?

group_1.textRight: Not at all.
Look behind you.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?
Whoa! There's a whole crowd of people!
Everyone was behind us, huh.
Do you think that means...we're in the lead?

group_1.textRight: I believe so.

group_1.textLeft: I wasn't sure how things would turn out when@we started, but...
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...it looks like we really could win now!
Right! Let's keep hustling while we're still@in the lead!
Huhhh...@I don't see it anywhere...
Masara! You see it over there?

group_1.textRight: No, I don't. I don't see it anywhere.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! There's a lot more people around@there now!

group_1.textRight: They appear to be searching for@Question 12, too.
They must've caught up to us while we were@looking for it.

group_1.textLeft: Shoot. And we were so far in the lead too.
The path splits into a fork here...@Which route should we take?

group_1.textRight: Let's see...
A team passed us earlier. They took the path@leading to the right.
And they haven't come back this way@since...

group_1.textLeft: Oooh!
That means the checkpoint is probably that@way!

group_1.textRight: Yes. We should go right, as well.

group_1.textLeft: Right! Let's go...

group_1.textRight: [chara:302902:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...?!@A Witch?

group_1.textLeft: No way! Now of all times?!

group_1.textRight: I didn't expect to see any on a hiking@course...

group_1.textLeft: Wait, it feels like it's coming from...
...over there?!

group_1.textRight: That's the direction we just came from.

group_1.textLeft: No waaay! The timing for this couldn't be@any worse.

group_1.textRight: We can't even enjoy a peaceful hike.
The work of a Magical Girl is never done.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301602:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]You're telling me...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect::flashWhite2][surround:3016A01]Take that!!!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:3016A03][name:sprite_0:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]...?!

group_1.textRight: Masara!
On it.
[flashEffect::flashWhite2][se:4061_landing_jump5]Hngh!@Haaah!

One more strike, just for good luck!@[chara:301600:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301600:cheek_0][chara:301600:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:301600:motion_400][flashEffect::flashWhite2][surround:3016A05][chara:301600:lipSynch_1]Take THAT!
We did it!

group_1.textLeft: Good going, team!

group_1.textRight: Likewise.

group_1.textLeft: We took care of the Witch, but we lost a@whole lot of time.
I wonder how far everyone else is now?

group_1.textRight: First thing's first. Let's return to where@we were before the fight.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, good idea.
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait...@Whaaaaaat?!

group_1.textRight: ...?!@[wait:0.8][chara:302902:lipSynch_1]What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Look! Over there!

group_1.textRight: Huh?! [wait:0.8][chara:302902:lipSynch_1]A checkpoint?

group_1.textLeft: To think there'd be one all the way out@here...

group_1.textRight: Indeed. It's quite a way out from the@actual route...
Quiz questions aside...
This must be the toughest checkpoint to@find in the entire race.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I think so, too.
Everyone's been running in circles trying@to find this one.

group_1.textRight: It's surprising that there ended up being@a checkpoint where a Labyrinth formed.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it?! But because we just happened to@find it...
...a comeback victory might be in the cards!

group_1.textRight: Possibly. This could be our lucky break.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's ride this wave of good luck@onward! Full speed ahead!

group_1.textRight: Yes.
